metadata.title: CVE-2023-34624 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered htmlcleaner thru = 2.28 allows attackers to cause adenial of service or other unspecified impacts via crafted object that usescyclic dependencies.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-34624` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libhtmlcleaner-java - 2.21-2ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libhtmlcleaner-java package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.21-2ubuntu0.1~esm1').
